creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 14 7/16 × 29 1/8 in. (36.7 × 74 cm) (outer frame, vertical ōban triptych)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Nakamura Gennosuke as Suketsune, Segawa Kikunojō as the Wife of Suketsune, Iwai Hanshirō as Hakuōmaru (Scene of the Kabuki Play Based on the Soga Brothers Story)
